A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though it may arguably be the prettiest / best shot Star Wars movie to date\, the story and character logic was jarringly off. It loses extra points for making the retread First Order even less feared. It also threw away any chance of a exciting conclusion to look forward to. Infinity War is an excellent example for how to have a crushing defeat caused by mistakes that subverts expectations\, not this...
